messages.message: Yup, you should see the way to add it in admin configuration! it's just a stat I think. Is there another way I could be doing this?
Hi Jessica, I think it ends up calling list_dir to the file service so it seems like a request that tries to list this directory
ah you know what that's because we don't know what the file will be called.... maybe we can always upload it as the same name and then we can do a stat
